clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of SPI-1005
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Double-blind, Placebo-controled, Randomized Single Ascending Dose Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of SPI-1005 (Ebselen)in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: A study to determine the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of SPI-1005 capsules in healthy adults.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse Events as a Measure of Safety and Tolerability
primary_outcome.description: The primary objective of this study was to evaluate the safety and tolerability of SPI-1005 (ebselen) in healthy subjects. Incidence and severity of Adverse Events were determined in all treatment and placebo groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of SPI-1005 and its major metabolites in healthy subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the single dose pharmacokinetic profile of SPI-1005 in healthy subjects including Tmax, Cmax, of the parent compound and major metabolites.
